price: 46. Leur réclamerais-tu une récompense qui les grèverait d’une lourde dette ?
arabic: أَمۡ تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ أَجۡرٗا فَهُم مِّن مَّغۡرَمٖ مُّثۡقَلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: am tasaluhum ajran fahum min maghramin muth'qalūna
